patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================

+++ 
@@ -1,14 +1,14 @@
 atlantisDataStorage: "/home/atlantis/.atlantis"
+
 atlantisSecret:
-  ghToken: "SEU_GITHUB_TOKEN"
-ingress:
-  enabled: true
-  annotations:
-    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "true"
-  hosts:
-    - atlantis.seu-dominio.com
-  tls:

-        - atlantis.seu-dominio.com

\ No newline at end of file
-repoWhitelist: "github.com/brenomodesto/*"
+  ghToken: "SEU_GITHUB_TOKEN" # Substitua pelo token gerado no GitHub.
+
+service:
+  type: LoadBalancer
+  port: 80
+  targetPort: 4141
+
+repoWhitelist: "github.com/seu-usuario/*" # Substitua com seus repositórios.
+
+# Configuração de logs (opcional)
+logLevel: info

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
atlantisDataStorage: "/home/atlantis/.atlantis"
atlantisSecret:
  ghToken: "SEU_GITHUB_TOKEN"
ingress:
  enabled: true
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "true"
  hosts:
    - atlantis.seu-dominio.com
  tls:
    - hosts:
        - atlantis.seu-dominio.com
      secretName: atlantis-tls
repoWhitelist: "github.com/brenomodesto/*"
